attributes.action: adopt the 35-hour working week and stop promoting the 'opt-out' clause.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, petition the PM to bring Britain up to the standard of other EU countries, most notably France, by strongly championing and adopting through legislation the 35-hour week across the UK, and by not allowing businesses to ask/force their workers to 'opt-out' of having to comply with this.
